name: telepathy

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.

short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.
